languages.text: Весь инфочип покрыт слюнями и желудочными соками. Похоже, кто-то буквально "скормил" его животному.
The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.
languages.original_text: Весь инфочип покрыт слюнями и желудочными соками. Похоже, кто-то буквально "скормил" его животному.

traits.locale_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.
The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.
The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.
The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.
The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

languages.text: 这枚数据芯片表面覆满了唾液和胃液，似乎有人把它喂给了某种动物。
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: 这枚数据芯片表面覆满了唾液和胃液，似乎有人把它喂给了某种动物。

languages.text: データチップ全体が唾液と胃液で覆われている。文字通り誰かが動物に与えたように見える。
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: データチップ全体が唾液と胃液で覆われている。文字通り誰かが動物に与えたように見える。

languages.text: Todo el chip de datos está cubierto de saliva y jugos gástricos. Parece que alguien se lo dio a un animal para que se lo comiera.
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: Todo el chip de datos está cubierto de saliva y jugos gástricos. Parece que alguien se lo dio a un animal para que se lo comiera.

languages.text: Der gesamte Datenchip ist mit Spucke und Verdauungsflüssigkeiten bedeckt. Es sieht aus, als hätte ihn jemand buchstäblich an ein Tier verfüttert.
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: Der gesamte Datenchip ist mit Spucke und Verdauungsflüssigkeiten bedeckt. Es sieht aus, als hätte ihn jemand buchstäblich an ein Tier verfüttert.

languages.text: Veri yongasının her yanı salya ve mide sıvısıyla kaplı. Sanki biri onu bir hayvana vermiş.
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: Veri yongasının her yanı salya ve mide sıvısıyla kaplı. Sanki biri onu bir hayvana vermiş.

languages.text: La puce est entièrement recouverte de salive et de sucs gastriques, comme si on l'avait littéralement jetée en pâture à un animal.
languages.original_text: The entire data-chip is covered in saliva and gastric juices. It looks as though someone literally fed it to an animal.

traits.locale_text: La puce est entièrement recouverte de salive et de sucs gastriques, comme si on l'avait littéralement jetée en pâture à un animal.
